JsonLd.name: FreeCustom.Email
JsonLd.description: FreeCustom.Email is a privacy-first disposable email platform for testing, devs, and fast signups. Offers free and pro plans.

PageContent.h1: How Our Fast & Custom Disposable Temp Mail Technology Works
PageContent.p1: In today's world, online services‚Äîfrom free trials to community chats‚Äîdemand email addresses, exposing you to spam, bots, and unsolicited tracking. With FreeCustom.Email, you get an instant, ad‚Äëfree custom temp mail address across multiple domains‚Äîno sign‚Äëup required and always secure.
PageContent.p2_part1: This service is forever free, fully ad‚Äëfree, and optimized for speed using lightweight code, edge caching, and global domains. Learn more about our

EmailBox.error_valid_prefix: Please enter a valid email prefix
EmailBox.inbox_empty_subtitle: Waiting for incoming emails. No need to refresh.
EmailBox.card_header_title: Generate Your Best Custom Temp Mail Address Instantly
EmailBox.card_header_p: Avoid spam, phishing, and automated bots with a secure, ad‚Äëfree custom temp mail. Keep your real inbox clean and privacy intact‚Äîwith instant generation, no sign‚Äëup, forever free.

WhySection.snippet_p: Custom temp mail is your first line of defense in digital privacy. Generate a disposable, ad-free email address instantly from multiple domains. With FreeCustom.Email, you get a secure temporary email for privacy, spam protection, and fast, anonymous sign-ups. Now with Free and Pro plans for advanced features.
WhySection.domain_list_title: FreeCustom.Email Domains for Custom Temp Mail
WhySection.domain_list_p: Choose from our curated list of domains to ensure your temp mail is always deliverable and never blocked.
WhySection.updates_title: From Anonymous Use to Pro Power: New Features
WhySection.updates_p: FreeCustom.Email has evolved. While anonymous use remains fast and free, you can now log in with your whatsyour.info account to unlock powerful new features tailored for regular users, developers, and businesses.
WhySection.updates_item1_desc: For quick, one-off tasks. Get an instant temp email with 5-message history and 12-hour storage. No attachments, no login needed.
WhySection.updates_item2_desc: Log in for more control. Get a 10-message history, 24-hour storage, support for 1MB attachments, and the ability to save important emails to your browser.
WhySection.updates_item3_desc: The ultimate temp mail pro experience. Use your own business domains (e.g., @your-company.com), get 5GB of permanent cloud storage, 25MB attachments, and full API access for seamless integration.
WhySection.definition_title: What Is Disposable Temporary Email (Temp Mail)?
WhySection.definition_p: A disposable or temporary email (also known as temp mail) is a short-lived address for online sign-ups, protecting your real inbox from spam. It's the perfect tool for maintaining privacy. Learn how to create a temp mail address for personal or business use.
WhySection.use_case_title: Why Use Custom Temp Mail? From Personal to Business
WhySection.use_case_item1: Protect your personal inbox from marketing spam during online shopping.
WhySection.use_case_item2: Developers can test user registration flows without cluttering a real inbox.
WhySection.use_case_item3: Businesses can use temp mail with custom domains for internal testing and quality assurance.
WhySection.use_case_item4: Safely access content, download resources, and join communities without revealing your primary email.
WhySection.checklist_title: How to Choose the Best Temp Mail Service
WhySection.checklist_item1: Instant, custom temporary email addresses with zero registration.
WhySection.checklist_item2: A clear, ad-free experience focused on speed and privacy.
WhySection.checklist_item3: Support for custom domains for professional temp mail business use.
WhySection.checklist_item4: Flexible storage options, from temporary Redis to permanent cloud storage.
WhySection.checklist_item5: A reliable platform with a public commitment to being forever-free.
WhySection.checklist_item6: Advanced features for Pro users, including large attachments and API access.
WhySection.checklist_p: Freecustom.email delivers on all fronts, providing a versatile solution that scales from simple, anonymous use to a powerful tool for professionals.
WhySection.usage_title: How to Use FreeCustom.Email Temp Mail
WhySection.usage_p1: Just visit the site, enter a custom name, pick a domain, and your temp mailbox is live. No ads, no sign-up. To unlock more power, simply log in with your WYI account. For details, see our post on <link>creating a temp mail address</link>.
WhySection.usage_p2: If an address gets too much spam, delete it and create another in seconds. Your real inbox is always safe.
WhySection.conclusion_title: The Best Choice for Custom & Professional Temp Mail
WhySection.conclusion_p1: Whether you need a quick burner address or a robust temp mail pro solution for your business, FreeCustom.Email is designed to meet your needs. We offer unmatched speed, privacy, and flexibility, all without ads.
WhySection.conclusion_p2: Explore our <link>best practices guide</link> to get the most out of your temporary email addresses.

Dashboard.title: Privacy Control Center
Dashboard.subtitle_pro: Manage your advanced privacy settings, custom domains, and block lists.
Dashboard.subtitle_free: Upgrade to Pro to unlock Custom Domains, Mute Lists, and advanced privacy controls.
Dashboard.ad_text: We rely on privacy-focused ads to keep the free tier running.
Dashboard.ad_upgrade: Upgrade to Pro to support development and remove ads.
Dashboard.domains_desc: Connect your own domain to receive emails (e.g., you@your-brand.com).
Dashboard.domains_empty_desc_pro: Add your first domain to get started.
Dashboard.domains_empty_desc_free: Upgrade to Pro to add your own domains.
Dashboard.guide_desc: Step-by-step instructions to add required DNS records and verify your domain.
Dashboard.guide_step_1: Make sure your domain is already added in the dashboard.
Dashboard.guide_step_3: Add or update the following DNS records:
Dashboard.guide_step_4: Wait for DNS propagation (can take minutes or hours).
Dashboard.guide_step_5: Come back here and click Verify.
Dashboard.guide_tip: Tip: Ensure there are no conflicting MX records.
Dashboard.mute_desc: Block emails from specific senders or entire domains to keep your inbox clean.
Dashboard.mute_empty_upsell: Upgrade to Pro to start blocking spammers.
Dashboard.info_title: Maximize Your Privacy with Advanced Controls
Dashboard.info_p1: The FreeCustom.Email dashboard is your command center for managing digital identity. While our temporary inboxes offer quick anonymity, the **Pro Dashboard** gives you persistent control over how the world contacts you.
Dashboard.info_card_1_desc: Brand consistency meets privacy. Use your own domain (e.g., `contact@my-startup.com`) while leveraging our secure, disposable infrastructure. Perfect for testing production environments or managing small business inquiries without setting up complex mail servers.
Dashboard.info_card_2_desc: Stop spam at the source. Unlike simple spam folders, our Mute List blocks emails at the network level before they even reach your temporary inbox. You can block individual stalkers or entire domains (e.g., `spammy-marketing.com`).
Dashboard.info_card_3_desc: Pro users get full access to our services with no ads. No slow launch of website due to ads.
